---
title: "Summarize parameter values for SS3 model setups"
output:
  md_document:
    variant: markdown_github
---

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  cache = TRUE,
  autodep = TRUE
)
options("width" = 90)
```

```{r}
library("ss3models")
library("dplyr")
d <- get_parvalues(system.file("models", package = "ss3models"), write_csv = FALSE)
```

```{r, results="asis"}
d[d$Label == "mat50%_fem", "Label"] <- "mat50perc_fem" # or we'll break knitr
d$PRIOR <- NULL
d$PR_type <- NULL
d$SD <- NULL
d <- d %>% mutate_each(funs(sprintf("%.1f", round(., digits = 1))), LO:HI)
knitr::kable(d, format = "markdown")
```

```{r}
knitr::kable(dplyr::arrange(d, Label), format = "markdown")
```
